text: The Big Sandy River may refer to one of the following rivers in the United States: *The Big Sandy River (Ohio River), on the border between Kentucky and West Virginia *The Big Sandy River (Tennessee), a tributary of the Tennessee River *The Big Sandy River (Wyoming), a tributary of the Green River *The Big Sandy River (Arizona), a tributary of the Bill Williams River == See also == * *Big Sandy Creek (disambiguation) *Little Sandy River (disambiguation) *Sandy River (disambiguation)
title: Big Sandy River
